vulnerabilities.name: OpenSSL Heartbeat Information Disclosure (Heartbleed)
remediation: Update OpenSSL to version 1.0.1g or later
Restart services using the old library

vulnerabilities.name: SMB Signing Not Required
remediation: Enable SMB signing on the server
Enforce SMB signing via group policy

vulnerabilities.name: HTTP TRACE Method Enabled
remediation: Disable TRACE method in web server configuration
